1.m_mText: "You'll need a key to open chests. Defeat the Artifact Captain to obtain chest keys."

2.m_mText: "Certain mechanisms activate certain gates. Be sure to pay attention to the colors!"

3.m_mText: "Alert level increases the more Rounds that pass. When Alert level becomes high, battles become increasingly difficult. The heist fails after Alert level reaches 100."

4.m_mText: "Act carefully during the heist, avoiding direct confrontation with Artifact Guards unless necessary. Engaging in battle increases their Alert level, and defeat will result in immediate failure."

5.m_mText: "Stay out of any Guards' line of sight during the heist. Being spotted will greatly increase their Alert level, and units will be sent to capture you."

6.m_mText: "Some doors can only be used in one direction. Once you've crossed through, there's no going back."

7.m_mText: "Secret passages will instantly transport you, like a portal."

8.m_mText: "Note that there are different types of mechanisms. Some only activate while standing on them, and deactivate as soon as you step off."

9.m_mText: "Some doors require multiple triggers to open. The number of lights on the door indicates how many triggers need to be activated."

10.m_mText: "Artifact Patrol are special units that patrol through the ship's cabin. Memorize their routes to avoid being spotted."

100.m_mText: ""The Fool's" Illusion distracts nearby enemies, who will come to investigate in the following round."

101.m_mText: ""The Fool" can instantly defeat any enemy, except for Artifact Captains. To obtain keys, you must still face them directly."

102.m_mText: ""The Moon's" bat form can pass under low bars or between boxes all while avoiding detection."

103.m_mText: ""The Moon" can apply gravitational force to select enemies, who will move towards that direction in the following round."

104.m_mText: ""The High Priestess" can return any unit to their position at the beginning of the current round."

105.m_mText: ""The High Priestess" can immobilize enemies, who lose their vision and cannot move in the following round."

106.m_mText: ""The Star" can fire an arrow in a select direction, eliminating the first enemy in its path and lighting any torch mechanisms it passes. The fire arrow has no effect on Artifact Captains."

107.m_mText: ""The Star" can fire a signal arrow drawing the attention of surrounding units, who will come investigate in the following round."
